product_name: Smith Delano Sunglasses - Red Sol-X - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight wearability, sleek lines and subtle surface details define these everyday shades. With impact-resistant lenses and glare-reducing red tint, they'll earn their keep on casual adventures.
short_description: Lightweight wearability, sleek lines and subtle surface details define these everyday shades. With impact-resistant lenses and glare-reducing red tint, they'll earn their keep on casual adventures.
